title: 07/07/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 07/07/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin knows that in sports, the most comfortable team always wins the game, and the Suns are that team. Aaron Rodgers keeps it cool even while golfing at The Match yesterday not budging even the slightest over Packers questions. Chris Paul knows this is his time to win but after this season, there's no need for the Suns to run it back with the same team next year. Everyone needs to stop saying injuries are playing a big part in the playoffs, everyone playing is hurt in some way at this stage.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Colin knows that in sports, the most comfortable team always wins the game, and the Suns are that team. Aaron Rodgers keeps it cool even while golfing at The Match yesterday not budging even the slightest over Packers questions. Chris Paul knows this is his time to win but after this season, there's no need for the Suns to run it back with the same team next year. Everyone needs to stop saying injuries are playing a big part in the playoffs, everyone playing is hurt in some way at this stage.
